document.full_text: an 899 million euro ($1.3 billion) eu antitrust fine was excessive and undeserved, microsoft corp told an eu court on tuesday in a case which could draw a line under a decade of legal battles.
document.title: microsoft appeals against eu antitrust fine
lines_and_colors: an 899 million euro ($1.3 billion) eu antitrust fine was excessive and undeserved, microsoft corp told an eu court on tuesday in a case which could draw a line under a decade of legal battles.
